purpose: The email announces the Call for Papers (CFP) for accepted workshops at the ACM/IEEE 28th International Conference on Model Driven Engineering Languages and Systems (MODELS 2025), scheduled for October 5-10, 2025, in Grand Rapids, Michigan. It highlights that the conference will be a hybrid event, allowing both in-person and virtual participation. The email provides details about the workshops, including their objectives, organizers, and links to their respective websites. Important deadlines for submissions and notifications are also included, along with a list of accepted workshops that cover various topics related to model-driven engineering.

infos:
